scripts.check: /bin/rm -rf node_modules/ .svelte-kit/output && npm ci && npx sv check
scripts.clean: /bin/rm -rf node_modules/ .svelte-kit/output && npm ci && npx sv check && npx vite build -m production
scripts.dev: /bin/rm -rf node_modules/ .svelte-kit/output && npm ci && npx sv check && vite build -m development && npx vite dev --host
scripts.prod: /bin/rm -rf node_modules/ .svelte-kit/output && npm ci && npx sv check && vite build -m production && node node_modules/.bin/vite -m production --cors --host www1.pcpllc.us --port 8443 -l info
scripts.rebuild:dev: /bin/rm -rf node_modules/ .svelte-kit/output && npm ci && npx sv check && vite build -m development
scripts.rebuild:prod: /bin/rm -rf node_modules/ .svelte-kit/output && npm ci && npx sv check && npx vite build -m production
